Articles.Content:
1.1.0.1230

Windows 7 Home Premium 64 bit

KSP Installer from store defaults to "KSP.exe" (32bit) and not the launcher or 64bit. While not an issue for anyone who even remotely understands Windows, non tech savy folks will always run 32bit without any option to use 64bit. Very minor, just thought I'd throw it out there. Good work nonetheless, less explodium in them there wheels, tho.
